.class public auto ansi sealed ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs)
public delegate void ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs ^ e);
type ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler = delegate of obj * ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 类的 事件定义 委托。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 可以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中访问 类的 事件，如本主题的示例中所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application, as shown in the example for this topic. 如果 属性 `true`，则在页执行结束时会引发 事件。The event is raised at the end of page execution if the property is `true`. 方法通过检查用户配置文件中每个 的 属性值，自动确定由基元类型、字符串或 对象组成的属性是否已更改。The method automatically determines whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or objects have been changed, by checking the property value for each in the user profile. 但是， 方法不能显式确定自定义类是否已更改。However, the method cannot explicitly determine whether a custom class has changed. 您可以处理 事件以确定自定义对象是否已修改并继续自动保存已修改的对象，如果没有修改任何对象，则取消自动保存。You can handle the event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and to continue with the automatic save for modified objects and cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified. 若要取消自动配置文件保存操作，请将 属性设置为在 事件中 `false`;否则，将 属性设置为 `true`。To cancel the automatic profile save operation, set the property to `false` in the event; otherwise, set the property to `true`. 事件可能有多个订户。There may be multiple subscribers to the event. 将使用 属性设置为的最后一个值。The will use the last value that the property is set to. 因此，建议你显式设置 事件中的 属性，无论你是取消还是继续自动保存，都可能需要覆盖由早期订阅服务器设置的值。As a result, it is recommended that you explicitly set the property in the event, regardless of whether you are canceling or continuing with the automatic save, as you may need to overwrite the value set by an earlier subscriber. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中包含的 事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving/CS/global.asax#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving/VB/global.asax#11)]
